game of pure competition

Definition

Class of games where players have exactly opposed interests.

  • Must be precisely 2 players
  • for all action profiles aâˆˆAa \in A, u1(a)+u2(a)=cu_1(a) + u_2(a) = c for some constant cc.
  • thus, we only need to story a utility function for one player

Special case when c=0c = 0 is Zero-sum game
